name: Rewinder (ricenoodles)
description:
*TO ENABLE SOUNDS PLAY IN CHROME/SAFARI/EDGE, IT WON'T WORK ON FIREFOX*

What will you do to bring your daughter back to safety?

Rewinder is a short twin-stick shooter, made for VimJam: Collectables (8 Bits to Infinity). It's a shor game with awesome backtrack capabilities. Shoot your way across this strange dimension and rewind your mistakes by saving your daughter's life.

You can play with Keyboard & Mouse (left-handed config. included) or Controller (Xbox One/360 recommended).

Code and Art by Adrian DKC (@ricenoodles)
SFX:  from Kenney & Juhani Junkala
Music:  "Stand With Us", "Constellation" and "The Void" by Trevor Lentz
Font: Pixellari by Zacchary Dempsey-Plante

 KNOWN ISSUES:

-How to obtain the confusing 4th node: https://gyazo.com/23de3b7ef52b5a36d5375c058dc6ff3a

-If you die, all items on the ground will disappear, including gameplay-critical RED ORBS:  necessary items to continue through the game *biggest face palm on earth*

-If you enter the lab while rewinding, it will bug your character and you will be stuck in the portal. Rewind again to get out.

Thank you everyone for your feedback, I greatly appreciate it!

*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*SPOILERS AHEAD*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*-*

-To unlock the secret ending, you will need a total of 16 nodes. To achieve that, craft the first 15 and head north from your base. At one point, you will see a lonely plant, head WEST from there and you will find the last and secret cluster.  Backtrack to craft your new and last node, and head back north again. Once you reach the final zone, don't activate the capsule and head EAST, you will find there the secret ending.
